org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui.page.renderer

Class PageRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui.page.renderer.PageRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentImageListener

    public class PageRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements DocumentImageListener
    Basic renderer for a document page that renders the document image.
    Add renderer plugins for additional layers.
    Author:
    clc
